id.description: The unique supplement identifier being md5 created from a concatenation of a type and a definiendum (if exists) or a content values.

type.description: The type of a supplement. It can be a 'definition' or a 'dictionary'.

definiendum.description: The term defined or described in a supplement content. Mainly it will be filled in case of Dictionary type.

definiens.description: The definition or a description in a supplement content. Mainly it will be filled in case of Dictionary type.
